item.title: About
item.description: My name is Currie Carmichael, I’m a professional painter who’s been serving the islands between Parry Sound and Moon River since 2016. I’ve been a cottager in the area my entire life and am prepared, equipped, and ready to handle any project on the Bay. My season generally lasts from mid-May until the end of September. I offer, for every service, a firm, quoted price. I believe this is the fairest structure for both parties.

item.title: Exterior Painting
item.description: I offer modern, efficient, large-scale exterior painting. Modern; I use the most modern equipment and tools as the basis of my process. Efficient; my process is effective and practiced. Large-scale; my process can handle any size job on the Bay. Process Estimation Washing Preparation Application Cleanup Estimation I require two numbers: The days it will take to complete the job The gallons of paint required I don’t do any fancy measurements to figure them out, just my own gut-feeling tempered with experience.

item.title: Gutter Cleaning
item.description: Using a high-pressure pressure washer, an extension wand, and a special attachment, I am able to wash-out your eavestroughs without ever having to climb a ladder. Fast, efficient, and highly effective. NOTE: Currently this service is only offered as an add-on to my other services.

item.title: Glossary
item.description: Caulking Caulk is used to seal gaps and seems between intersecting surfaces (baseboards|walls, trim|walls, …). Thus, caulking not only helps to insulate your buildings, but is also an important aesthetic process. Flashing Light interacting differently with different parts of the same surface creates a discrepancy in it’s visual experience. Depending on the amount and direction of the light, flashing can be very [noticible](https://www.google.ca/?gws_rd=ssl#q=paint flashing&tbm=isch).

item.title: Spraying
item.description: Spraying is a basic method of paint-application for the modern painter, forming a trinity with the traditional methods of brushing and rolling. The main benefit of spraying is speed. A two-story house that used to take 10 days to paint with a brush and roller, can be sprayed in 1 or 2 days by just one person. An incredible productivity boost! Spraying also leaves the finest finish. Anytime paint is applied with a brush, lap marks, caused by the bristles dragging out the paint, are inevitably left behind and visible to the critical eye.

item.title: What is Paint?
item.description: The term paint has become convoluted due to the terminology used by ‘paint’-manufactures in their marketing. People use the word ‘paint’ for anything that you can put on with a brush, hence the verb ’to paint’. The problem is that the ‘paint’-industry uses the word ‘paint’ for a class of its products. It’s like a restaurant replacing the word ’entree’ with ‘food’. As a consequence, people end up calling different things ‘paint’, even thou they might differ greatly in function.

item.title: Hiring
item.description: Looking for a summer job? Look no further! Join the greatest band of painters ever assembled on Georgian Bayfor an epic, summer-long adventure of: Backbrushing… Brush arm and leg through hundreds, potentially thousands of gallons of paint as you struggle to push viscous liquid deep within the cavernous pores of wood Caulking… Caulk where no man has caulked before; Grab that Caulk and Caulk baby; CAUUULLLLLKKK Masking… Defend thousands of square-feet of window and deck from the dreaded overspray; block its vain attempts to destroy my reputation Moving… Pickup things in one location and move them to another location using the magic of the human motor system Painting… …painting…?
